name: [Meals Redemption] Trust me, we can win
name_original: [Meals Redemption] Trust me, we can win
description:
I believe that this Co-op game will build stronger friendships. Well… used to...

Trust Me, We Can Win

"Trust me, we can win" is a Couch Co-Operative Clicker-like Adventure game. Fight against those monsters with your friends by simply hit the keyboard buttons. Get the item as a reward every time you kill those creatures. Use those items to take advantage in your battle and build up your unique strategies.

Every action matters. A single split-second decision can change the course of the game.

Can your fight and breakthrough all the enemy defence to the end?

Meal Redemption

Aunnap Kattiyanet (Game Designer/Programmer)

Chanasorn Pisitsetthapong (2D Artist/Sound Engineer)

Raweewat Ngeabprasert (Game Designer/Programmer/UI Designer)

Tanayoung Ruksawong (Game Designer/UI Designer)

Thasorn Chalongvorachai (Game Designer/Scrum Master)
